name: Sleepy Sheepy
description:
Sleepy Sheepy
*Beep Boop*
Please collect the sleepy sheepy and return them to bed.
We need their dreams in order to power up.
Sincerely, The Dream Machine Controls
  • WASD - To move character
  • 'E' to throw sheep after collecting
  • Collide with sheep to pickup
  • Avoid shoot-y things
  • Don't die, we need the sleepy sheepy dreams
  • 2 Sheep to power the machine
  • You'll figure it out
Developed for the Hexcode x Theme Showdown Jam 2
